TypeSignature.Value: public interface IExtensibleObject<T> where T : IExtensibleObject<T>
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtensibleObject`1<(class System.ServiceModel.IExtensibleObject`1<!T>) T>
generic <typename T> where T : IExtensibleObject<T>public interface class IExtensibleObject

span.span: The type of the extension class.

summary.span: Enable an object to participate in custom behavior, such as registering for events, or watching state transitions.

span.span: Enable an object to participate in custom behavior, such as registering for events, or watching state transitions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implémentez pour activer l'agrégation d'extensions.Implement to enable aggregation of extensions. Par exemple, si vous implémentez une classe `TreeNode` et que vous souhaitez permettre à du code externe d'ajouter des annotations et des méthodes à certaines instances de `TreeNode`, vous pouvez implémenter `TreeNode` via `IExtensibleObject`.For example, if you are implementing a `TreeNode` class and want to allow external code to add annotations and methods to some instances of `TreeNode`, you can have `TreeNode` implement `IExtensibleObject`. Cela permet au code qui utilise `TreeNode` d'ajouter des objets qui implémentent `IExtensibleObject` à la collection .This enables code that uses `TreeNode` to add objects that implement `IExtensibleObject` to the collection. Il existe quatre objets extensibles dans [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] :There are four extensible objects in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]: - - - - Pour une discussion à propos de la création d’extension pour travailler avec ces objets, consultez [objets extensibles](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extensible-objects.md).For a discussion about how to create extension to work with these objects, see [Extensible Objects](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extensible-objects.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Extensions As IExtensionCollection(Of T)

summary.span: Gets a collection of extension objects for this extensible object.

span.span: Gets a collection of extension objects for this extensible object.
